application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T67 Lime - lift crown to give around 3m ground clearance over public footpath T68 London plane - Climb to inspect for Massaria and remove branches up to 80mm in diameter, where the branches are exhibiting clear symptoms of Massaria infection. T69 Lime - Lift crown to give around 3m ground clearance over footpath.T70 London plane - repollard back to most recent points by removing around 1.5m regrowth.T71 London plane - remove major deadwood and inspect for Massaria and remove branches up to 80mm in diameter, where the branches are exhibiting clear symptoms of Massaria infection. T72 London plane - remove major deadwood and inspect for Massaria and remove branches up to 80mm in diameter, where the branches are exhibiting clear symptoms of Massaria infection. T73 London plane - inspect for Massaria and remove branches up to 80mm in diameter, where the branches are exhibiting clear symptoms of Massaria infection. T74 London plane - inspect for Massaria and remove branches up to 80mm in diameter, where the branches are exhibiting clear symptoms of Massaria infection.T75 London plane - inspect for Massaria and remove branches up to 80mm in diameter, where the branches are exhibiting clear symptoms of Massaria infection. T76 London plane - inspect for Massaria and remove branches up to 80mm in diameter, where the branches are exhibiting clear symptoms of Massaria infection.T77 London plane - Lift crown to give around 3m ground clearance over public footpath.T78 London plane - Lift crown to give around 4m ground clearance over adjacent access road to W. T79 London plane - inspect for Massaria and remove branches up to 80mm in diameter, where the branches are exhibiting clear symptoms of Massaria infection.
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
